committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to provide for the selection of additional lands for inclusion within the Bon Secour National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Provides for the selection of additional lands in Alabama for inclusion within the Bon Secour National Wildlife Refuge. Amends the Federal Aid in Wildlife Restoration Act to make American Samoa eligible for wildlife restoration work and hunter safety programs.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the selection of additional lands for inclusion within the Bon Secour National Wildlife Refuge.
